title: Is there a public pool in the Wilmington/Ogden area?
text:
Here's a link that lists several. I hope this helps.



http://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a&um=1&ie=UTF-8&q=wilmington,+nc+public+pools&fb=1&split=1&gl=us&view=text&ei=j7BtSvryBYToM_j4nPkG&sa=X&oi=local_group&ct=more-results&resnum=1
